question:
Consider the following statements about the Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY):
  1. Under this scheme, the government provides the risk coverage of Rs.2 lakh for accidental death and Rs.1 lakh for full disability.
  2. The scheme is available only for the people in the age group 18-70 years
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect. Under the Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana scheme, the government provides the risk coverage of Rs. 2 lakh for accidental death & full disability and Rs. 1 lakh for partial disability. Second statement is correct because the scheme will be available to people in the age group 18 to 70 years with a bank account, from where the premium would be collected through the facility of “auto-debit”.
